fulltext:
LE HAI THIEN 
PHOTO   
SUMMARY 
A hard-working, ambitious lawyer with a good command of English 
and 5 years of experience in providing legal services to foreign 
investors and foreign-invested companies in Vietnam; being able to 
work with foreign colleagues, with 4 years of experience directly 
assisting a foreign lawyer (partner) practicing in Vietnam. A proactive 
learner with multidisciplinary knowledge, who learns programming 
by self-studying and being able to write programs to automate 
Microsoft Office applications and organize legal documents in 
company. Seeking a more challenging role in a company to which I 
can contribute with my skills and grow. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
7/2019 – 8/2019 
Legal Associate, VILAF 
• 
Assisting my partner in rendering legal advice on dispute 
matters related to environment, investment, enterprise, civil, 
and civil procedure regulations; and 
• 
Drafting and translating agreements and legal documents. 
7/2016 – 7/2018 
Legal Associate cum Assistant Manager, VCI Legal 
• 
Advising foreign investors and foreign-invested companies 
on investment, M&A, legal due diligence, and other corporate 
matters; 
• 
Representing clients in litigation at courts in commercial and 
labor disputes; 
• 
Reviewing legal works of paralegals; managing and 
allocating tasks; and 
• 
Assisting partners to research and write 2 legal articles which 
were successfully published on international legal magazines 
for marketing purpose. 
7/2015 – 6/2016 
Director, First Mover Co., Ltd. 
• 
Being the legal representative of First Mover, a start-up 
company established by me and 3 other friends, which 
provide document translation, incorporation, accounting, and 
data processing services to individuals and small enterprises 
doing business in Ho Chi Minh City. 
7/2012 – 6/2015 
Paralegal, VCI Legal 
• 
Assisting associates in doing legal research, drafting and 
translating documents, submitting documents to competent 
authorities; and handling any other tasks assigned by 
associates and partners. 
2/2012 – 7/2012 
Court Clerk, Can Gio District Court 
• 
Assisting the Deputy Chief Judge in handling civil and 
commercial disputes. 
CONTACT   
Address: 
692/58 Doan Van Bo Street, 
Ward 16, District 4, HCMC 
Phone: 
+84 (0)772.000.048  
Email: 
thien@thienlawyer.com 
Personal website: 
www.thienlawyer.com 
KEY SKILLS 
Foreign Investment, Corporate, 
M&A, Contract, Dispute 
Resolution; 
Legal Advice, Legal Drafting, 
Legal English, Legal Research; 
Management, Problem Solving, 
Communication; 
MS Office, Python Programming; 
LANGUAGES 
Vietnamese – Native speaker 
English – Advanced 
Chinese – Upper Beginner 
EDUCATION & CERTIFICATES 
9/2017 
Lawyer Practicing Certificate 
10/2016 
Passing Bar Examination, Vietnam Bar Federation 
9/2014 – 8/2016 
Business and Financial Management, International University 
(Vietnam National University - HCMC) 
6/2014 
MBA Scholarship Award, International University (Vietnam National 
University - HCMC) 
7/2012 – 1/2013 
Lawyer Training Program, Judicial Institute - Ministry of Justice 
10/2011 
English Certificate - TOEIC 850 
10/2007 – 10/2011 
Bachelor’s Degree on International Commercial Law, University of 
Economics and Laws (Vietnam National University - HCMC) 
REFERENCES 
Tran Anh Hien (Mr.)  
Partner – VILAF 
hien.tran@vilaf.com.vn  
Phung Anh Tuan (Mr.) 
Managing Partner – VCI LEGAL 
tuanphung@vci-legal.com
